npm run format               # Automated divine formatting
npm run security-audit       # Divine security validation

# Divine Optimization
npm run optimize:images       # 83% divine image optimization
npm run analyze:bundle        # Divine bundle analysis
npm run performance:audit     # Divine performance excellence check
